website_summaries.verdict: A unique pair of golf shoes made by a top manufacturer. Some ladies love the versatile design; others prefer to stick to classic styles when they take to the greens.
pros: Sturdy leather golf shoes with low-profile traction
Hybrid design allows shoes to double as sneakers that can be worn off the course
Rounded toes, water-resistant build, and removable insoles add to their comfort
cons: Sizes may run a bit small
Some women find the style unflattering

customer_reviews.title: Not for Me
customer_reviews.text: I only buy ECCO spikeless golf shoes. This current style is not at ALL comfortable. The ECCO's I have are straight out of the box comfy. I don't know why ECCO is changing its style for comfort. Once I tried it on I could tell it would give me a blister in the back heel area. It rubs the back area. Be careful when ordering these ECCO. I'm very disappointed ECCO. Bring back the real ECCO golf shoes!!!! I'm returning these.....
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Not the same fit as classic Ecco golf shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes to go with a pink flamigo theme we were doing. I've worn ECCO golf shoes for as many years as they have been produced. I can walk into a store, find a classic style in a 6-1/2 and know it will fit perfectly. I ordered the same size in these shoes, and could not wear them. The instep (from insole to top) is very narrow, and takes a flat foot, which I do not have. I gave them to a friend, fit her just fine. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: gerri johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have foot problems!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried about 5 different golf shoes and these are absolutely the best! I have a problem with the bone above the ball of my right foot and it hurts a lot if I walk on it too much. I used to be a runner, but no more. With these Ecco golf shoes, they have a big toe box (which I love) but are still very supportive. I can play 18 holes of golf with no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: A Southern Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about these shoes but had to return them. I am a 6 1/2 but ordered a 7 because I didn't see them available in 6 1/2 and didn't trust ordering them in a size 6. Otherwise i think they are cute and could be very comfortable if I was able to get the right size. They seem to run true to size. I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mdimaggi

customer_reviews.title: Love the way ECCO shoes fit.
customer_reviews.text: These are my favourite brand of golf shoes. I need a bit of extra room in the toe box which I get from ECCO. The colour is fabulous, so cute but not "gaudy". My girlfriends love the colour too, not "over the top".
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: too tight
customer_reviews.text: My foot is a wide foot, so it is tight, and its length is long and its back is loose. and color nice what I expected matching my golf wear i already use one day .. so i have to keep it ..never order again.
customer_reviews.author: Honey Bee

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking golf shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the style of this golf shoe, however it does run a little large.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely comfortable and attractive golf shoes. I wear them on and off the course.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gould

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love those shoes and the fit is great and extremely comfortable. Very happy with the services delivered as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Ecco is my go to golf shoe. I particularly like the comfortable show box.Pink is not my favorite color; but these caught me eye.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Traverse

customer_reviews.title: Exciting golf shoes are great for style and traction
customer_reviews.text: Exciting golf shoes are great for style and traction. This style runs a by too wide for me, especially for the brand, but I kept the pair anyway.
customer_reviews.author: bogey

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love everything Ecco. The arch support is great and easy to ckean
customer_reviews.author: Buster

customer_reviews.title: comfort 1st then style.
customer_reviews.text: I almost exclusively wear ecco golf shoes because I walk most courses and the sizing is the best comfort for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: too wide
customer_reviews.text: The fit is wide (unless they just sent me a wide pair accidentally), but I noticed that on the inside of the shoe it says "Extra Width".
customer_reviews.author: Bob & Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Ultra comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These golf shoes are very comfortable, look great and give good traction on the golf course without damaging the greens.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Frame

customer_reviews.title: I love my Ecco golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love my Ecco golf shoes! I have 5 pair in different colors and styles. They are so comfortable and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Froines

customer_reviews.title: Best Golf Shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I love ECCO shoes. I have 3 pair, and will be getting more. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe bought fir golf but have been wearing for everyday. Lots of compliments
customer_reviews.author: Kay D.

product_meta.title: ECCO Women's Casual Hybrid 2 Golf Shoe
product_meta.description:
A casual ladies golf shoe that focuses on performance, good looks and comfort to deliver a shoe for all levels of ability.

ECCO is a European shoe company founded in Denmark in 1963. Today they own and operate factories throughout Europe and Asia. They produce all the leather used in making Ecco shoes, taking measures to protect the environment at the same time. Their sole aim is to make a comfortable walking shoe.
feature_bullets: A trendy sneaker that can be worn on and off the golf course
Leather upper provides a comfortable feel and excellent breathability
ECCO HYDROMAX treated leather upper is superbly weather and perspiration resistant
E-DTS Hybrid Technology outsole provides 800 traction angles for excellent grip
Removable leather comfort fiber insole offers extra width
